name: Dracomorph

skills.name: Seeping Pain
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will attack 1 random enemy with any surplus damage if the target is killed. Damage inflicted is equal to triple the surplus damage.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Poison Jaws
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Has a 75% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Baleful Eye
skills.raw_description:
Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff and a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. * Weaken
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
